name: ISA-OLD+BIS
inits: BEnv (K NONE)⦇"MEM8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 FEMPTY)⦈
BEnv (K NONE)⦇"x9" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 y)); "x8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x)); "x6" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x0" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x12" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w))⦈
BEnv (K NONE)⦇"x9" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 y)); "x8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x))⦈
progs: BirProgram [<|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 0w) "00100313 (li t1,1)"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assign (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Const (Imm64 1w))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 4w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 4w) "00642023 (sw t1,0(s0))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x8" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x8" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x8" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 8w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 8w) "0A64A02F"; bb_atomic := T; bb_statements := [BStmt_Fence BM_ReadWrite BM_Write; BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x9" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assign (BVar "x0" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Cast BIExp_SignedCast (BExp_Load (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x9" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian Bit32) Bit64); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x9" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x9" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32)); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM_aqrl" (BType_Mem Bit1 Bit1)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM_aqrl" (BType_Mem Bit1 Bit1))) (BExp_Const (Imm1 1w)) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Const (Imm1 1w)))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 12w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 12w) "00042603 (lw a2,0(s0))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x8" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assign (BVar "x12" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Cast BIExp_SignedCast (BExp_Load (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x8" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian Bit32) Bit64)]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 16w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 16w) "00000013 (nop)"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := []; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Halt (BExp_Const (Imm32 0w))|>]
final: λss. ∃(mem,thds). (mem,thds) ∈ ss ⇒ bir_env_lookup "x10" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x11" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 2w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x12" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w))
